layout/base:
<!doctype html>
<!--[if IE 9 ]><html class="no-js ie9 lt-ie10" lang="{{ locale_name }}"><![endif]-->
<!--[if (gt IE 9)|!(IE)]><!--><html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}"><!--<![endif]-->
<head>

  <title>{{head.title}}</title>

  {{{head.meta_tags}}}
  {{{head.config}}}

  <link href="{{head.favicon}}" rel="shortcut icon">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
  {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
  {{ getFontsCollection }}

  {{{head.scripts}}}
  {{{head.rsslinks}}}

  {{> components/common/global-injects}}

  {{{snippet 'html_head'}}}

  {{> core/structured-data/website}}
</head>

<body
  class="{{> components/common/body-class}}"
  data-layout="{{theme_settings.product-grid-layout}}"
>

  {{#if page_type '===' 'product'}}
    {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
  {{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post'}}
    {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
  {{/if}}

  {{{snippet 'header'}}}

  {{> components/header}}

  <main class="main-content">
    {{#if template_file "!==" "pages/home"}}
      {{> components/common/banners banners=banners.top type='top'}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#block "page"}}{{/block}}

    {{> components/common/banners banners=banners.bottom type='bottom'}}
  </main>

  {{> components/navigation-header}}
  {{> components/footer}}
  {{> components/footer-modals}}

  {{> core/structured-data/breadcrumbs}}

  <script src="{{cdn '/assets/js/bundle.js'}}"></script>
  <script>
    // Exported in app.js
    window.stencilBootstrap("{{template_file}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
  </script>
  {{{footer.scripts}}}

  {{{snippet 'footer'}}}
  </body>
</html>
components/common/breadcrumbs: {{#if this.hide_last}} {{#each this.list}} {{#unless @last}} {{> components/common/breadcrumbs-partial this}} {{/unless}} {{/each}} {{else}} {{#each this.list}} {{> components/common/breadcrumbs-partial this}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
core/alerts/alert-error:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
core/alerts/alert-success:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
core/account/_private/messages-form:
{{! TODO: Reuse forms/common/select partial when Handlebars is updated to v4 }}
{{> core/forms/common/text name='message_subject' required=true label=(lang 'core.account.inbox.subject')}} {{> core/forms/common/multiline name='message_content' required=true rows=7 label=(lang 'core.account.inbox.message')}}
core/account/_private/messages-list:
{{#if messages}} {{#each messages}} {{/each}}

{{subject}}

{{message}}
 {{date}}
{{else}}
{{lang 'core.account.messages.no_messages'}}
{{/if}}
components/header:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image.data}} {{/if}} {{settings.store_logo.title}}
{{> components/header-menu}}
components/navigation-header:
{{#each categories}}
  • {{name}} {{#if children}}
      {{#unless ../../theme_settings.hide-parent-menu-items}}
    • {{lang 'common.header.view_all' name=name}}
      • {{/unless}} {{#each children}}
    • {{name}} {{#if children}}
        {{#unless ../../../../theme_settings.hide-parent-menu-items}}
      • {{lang 'common.header.view_all' name=name}}
        • {{/unless}} {{#each children}}
      • {{name}}
        • {{/each}}
      {{/if}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if shop_by_brand}}
    {{#each (limit shop_by_brand 10)}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}} {{#if shop_by_brand.length '>' 10}}
  • {{lang 'brands.view_brands'}}
    • {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if pages}}
    {{#each pages}}
  • {{name}} {{#if children}}
      {{#each children}}
    • {{name}} {{#if children}}
        {{#unless ../../theme_settings.hide-parent-menu-items}}
      • {{lang 'common.header.view' name=name}}
        • {{/unless}} {{#each children}}
      • {{name}}
        • {{/each}}
      {{/if}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{> components/cart/quick-cart}}
components/footer:
{{> components/navigation-footer}}
{{#if social_media}}
    {{#each social_media}}
  • {{#compare display_name 'google+' operator='==='}} {{else}} {{/compare}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{#if settings.show_newsletter_box}}
{{> components/common/mailing-list location="footer-module"}}
{{/if}}
{{! TODO: When custom blocks come in to play, allow a custom block to be shown here }} {{#if settings.address}}
{{nl2br settings.address}}
{{/if}} {{#if settings.phone_number.length}}

{{settings.phone_number}}

{{/if}}
{{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}}
    {{#if customer}}
  • {{lang 'account_general.your_account'}}
  • {{lang 'account_general.log_out'}}
    • {{else}}
  • {{lang 'account_general.log_in'}}
  • {{lang 'account_general.sign_up'}}
    • {{/if}}
{{/if}}
    {{! TODO: Any other static links? }} {{#if settings.gift_certificates_enabled}}
  • {{lang 'gift_certificate.heading'}}
    • {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'sitemap.heading'}}
    {{#if theme_settings.payment-visa}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.payment-mastercard}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.payment-american-express}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.payment-discover}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.payment-paypal}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.payment-apple-pay}}
    • {{/if}}
{{#if theme_settings.geotrust-ssl-common-name}} {{> core/geotrust-ssl-seal}} {{/if}}

© {{settings.store_name}}

{{#if theme_settings.theme-credits}}

{{/if}}
components/footer-modals:
{{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
{{lang 'common.close'}}
{{#if page_type '==' 'product' }} {{#if settings.show_product_reviews}}
{{> components/products/review-modal}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
components/common/breadcrumbs-partial: • {{#unless @first}}› {{/unless}} {{#if url}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
core/account/_private/navigation:
• {{lang 'core.account.menu.orders'}}
    • {{#if settings.returns_enabled}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.returns'}}
    • {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.messages'}} {{#if customer.num_new_messages}} {{customer.num_new_messages}} {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.addresses'}}
    • {{#if settings.show_wishlist}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.wishlists'}}
    • {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.recently_viewed'}}
  • {{lang 'core.account.menu.settings'}}
{{#if customer.store_credit.value '>' 0}} {{> core/alerts/alert-success (lang 'core.account.common.store_credit' store_credit=customer.store_credit.formatted)}} {{/if}}
components/header-menu:
• {{lang 'product.label'}}
    • {{#if shop_by_brand}}
  • {{lang 'brands.label'}}
    • {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'page.label'}}
  • {{lang 'search.label'}}
  • {{lang 'cart.label'}}
components/cart/quick-cart:
{{> components/cart/quick-cart-content this}}
{{> components/cart/quick-cart-totals this}}
components/navigation-footer:
• {{lang 'product.label'}}
    • {{#if shop_by_brand}}
  • {{lang 'brands.label'}}
    • {{/if}}
  • {{lang 'page.label'}}
  • {{lang 'search.label'}}
  • {{lang 'cart.label'}}
components/common/mailing-list:
{{lang 'footer.mailing_list'}}

{{lang 'footer.mailing_list_blurb'}}

{{#if settings.show_newsletter_summary}}

{{settings.newsletter_summary}}

{{/if}}
components/products/review-modal:
{{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}}

{{#each product.reviews.messages}} {{#if error '===' ''}} {{> core/alerts/alert-error message=(lang 'product.reviews.errors.general')}} {{else}} {{#if error}} {{> core/alerts/alert-error message=error}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if success}} {{> core/alerts/alert-success message=success}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{! Rating selection }}
{{lang 'product.reviews.form.select_a_rating'}}
{{! Name }}
{{! Email }}
{{! Review Subject }}
{{! Comments }}
{{! Captcha }} {{#if product.reviews.captcha}} {{> core/forms/common/captcha captcha=product.reviews.captcha name=recaptcha_response_field}} {{/if}} {{#if product.reviews.throttleToken}} {{/if}}
components/cart/quick-cart-content:
{{#if cart.items.length}} {{#each cart.items}} {{> components/cart/quick-cart-item this default_image=../theme_settings.default_image}} {{/each}} {{else}}
{{lang 'cart.empty'}}
{{/if}}
components/cart/quick-cart-totals:
{{#if cart.items.length}}
{{lang 'cart.subtotal'}}:
{{cart.sub_total.formatted}}
{{lang 'cart.checkout'}} {{#if cart.show_multiple_address_shipping}} {{lang 'cart.checkout_multiple'}} {{/if}} {{lang 'account_general.view_cart'}}
{{/if}}
components/cart/quick-cart-item:
{{#if type "!==" "GiftCertificate"}} {{quantity}}
{{/if}}
{{name}}
{{lang 'cart.quantity_in_cart' quantity=quantity at_price=price.formatted}}
